wordGroup: essential amino acid 必需氨基酸
amino group [有化]氨基（等于amino radical）
amino acid sequence 氨基酸序列；氨基酸顺序
amino acid analyzer 氨基酸分析仪；氨基酸组成分析仪
amino acid residue 氨基酸残基

sentences.en: Over time, the protein in the eggshell breaks down into its constituent amino acids.
sentences.cn: 随着时间的推移,蛋壳中的蛋白质分解成其构成成分氨基酸。

sentences.en: Amino acids are the building blocks of proteins.
sentences.cn: 氨基酸是蛋白质的组成部分。

sentences.en: What they'll look for specifically in the soil is amino acids.
sentences.cn: 他们尤其想在土壤中找到的是氨基酸。
